data.event: After the Northern Rising of 1569, Elizabeth I confiscated Brancepeth Castle and its territories.

event.title: bought the whole estate of Brandon manor for £1,700 in 1630

data.event: A silk merchant, Edward Cropley, bought the whole estate of Brandon manor for £1,700 in 1630, and his family held onto the property till 1710.
A silk merchant, Edward Cropley, bought the whole estate of Brandon manor for £1,700 in 1630, and his family held onto the property till 1710.
